message: I've created this blog a while back when got tired of the obvious issues in Mac OS, iOS, my Macbook Pro that couldn't wake up... Apple policy "it just works and if it doesn't – something is wrong with you" got long in the tooth. You can't really report and issue to Apple, so I am just listing them in my blog http://dear-apple.com  If you got funny and interesting suggestion on your mind or something is just driving you crazy in Apple product, drop a message here.
I never new that Finder Documents, etc were only displayed in 4000KB blocks. That seems annoying.

@apfeljonas first it is displayed in 4KB not 4000KB blocks, and second i think it did get changed in snow leopard but if it is that big of a deal you can use a finder replacement, and second lot of the stuff on that site seems to come from people that don't undertstand apple that much and why they do the things they do so yea i doubt anyone with apple would see that site and agree with it but hey who knows

Finder replacement is bit out of scope. Then it doesn't matter if its 4kb or 4000 bytes, it's not the file size anyway. My "understanding of Apple" tells me that they just don't have enough time to pay attention to everything unfortunately.
